raw_body: A simple and beautiful lady, much loved wife of the late Milroy Brohier, wonderful Mother of Victorine, Tania, Marice and Marietta (Switzerland and Australia), mother-in-law of Dugal (Switzerland), adored by her grandchildren Tamara, Bradley, Tiphany, Stephan, Tara, and Michael, loved by family friend Genny, passed away peacefully on Saturday, 30th December 2023. She was 89 years old.
